directions: Combine romaine lettuce, cauliflower, cucumber, bell pepper, carrot, celery, green onions, sunflower seeds, and parsley in a large bowl. Drizzle your favorite homemade dressing on top and season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 small carrot, peeled and finely chopped
1 tablespoon minced celery stalk and leaves
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Whole Plant Chopped Salad
